column1: Table D2.05.8: School attendance for children who usually attend school by year group(a), Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander children aged 4–14, 2014–15
Whether child missed days at school in last week
Missed days at school/preschool/kindergarten
Did not miss days at school/preschool/kindergarten
Main reason missed school in last week
Child or parent/guardian had illness or injury, or attending appointment
School not available or not open

Problems with child not attending school
No problems with child not attending school
Total
† Numbers and percents have a relative standard error between 25% and 50% and should be used with caution.
(a) Excludes does not usually attend school, home schooled, other schools (including special needs schools), not stated and not applicable.
(b) Includes cultural commitments, sorry business, away with parents and other reasons.
(c) Does not include children attending preschool.
Source: AIHW and ABS analysis of National Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander Social Survey 2014–15.
